name: Star Fox Combat (itcth)
description:
Game developed in Coppercube engine. Non-commercial game, models, characters and music are the property of Nintendo.
Game created as a tribute to this great classic from our childhood!
Control Arwing across different planets, eliminate all invaders before time runs out in this frantic arcade-style combat game.
Use AWSD and mouse as arwing pilot control.
Use left mouse button or Space to shoot.
Collect rings to extend time and dodge obstacles!
